title: Grewia asiatica
Parts of plant used: Root, Steam bark, Bud and Leaves
Chemical Constituents: Essential mineral elements, Carbohydrate, Protiens, Fattyy acid, Flavonoids, tannins, Phenols
Therapeutic uses: Help to remove Vatta, Kapha, treat rheumatism, used in respiration, cardiac and blood disorder and act as astringent.
